title: MD
biography: Gagandeep Kang FRS is an Indian public healthresearcher who has been leading the work on enteric diseases, diagnostics, genomics and epidemiology at the Gates Foundation since 2023.
aiSummary: Gagandeep Kang is a virology - rotavirus vaccine research specialist with an H-index of 110 at CMC Vellore (Faculty). Has been published in The Lancet Infectious Diseases, The Lancet Global Health, JAMA Pediatrics. Based in India.
